Episodes.Title: Crimes of the Hot
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Aaron Ehasz
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Earth is unable to offset its rising temperature through the usual process, which is the dropping of a giant ice cube into the ocean.

Episodes.Title: Jurassic Bark
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Kaplan
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry discovers the intact fossilized remains of his pet dog from his old life. The Professor reveals he can clone the animal.

Episodes.Title: The Route of All Evil
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Dan Vebber
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Prof. Farnsworth's and Hermes' 12 year old sons combine forces to take over Planet Express, but their ambition is more than their ability and they need their fathers' help to save the day.

Episodes.Title: A Taste of Freedom
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Horsted
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Dr. Zoidberg's exuberant celebration of Freedom Day makes him Public Enemy #1.

Episodes.Title: Kif Gets Knocked Up a Notch
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Bill Odenkirk
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Amy is distressed when her alien boyfriend Kif becomes pregnant.

Episodes.Title: Less Than Hero
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Ron Weiner
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: After using a tube of "miracle cream" Fry and Leela gain super powers and form "The New Justice Team" along with Bender.

Episodes.Title: Teenage Mutant Leela's Hurdles
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Jeff Westbrook
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: After an overdose at a health club makes the Planet Express staff get younger and younger, they have to find a mysterious Fountain of Aging. Meanwhile, Leela experiences the teenage life she never had with her parents.

Episodes.Title: The Why of Fry
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Kristin Gore
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry learns his accidental freezing 1,004 years earlier wasn't an accident. He is given a choice that could prevent its happening, but at a cost.

Episodes.Title: The Sting
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Patric M. Verrone
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Sent on the same mission which caused the deaths of the previous Planet Express crew, Leela mourns the apparent death of Fry.

Episodes.Title: The Farnsworth Parabox
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Bill Odenkirk
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Prof. Farnworth creates a box which contains an entire universe and sends Leela into it, where she discovers another Planet Express with a few notable differences.

Episodes.Title: Three Hundred Big Boys
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Kaplan
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Everyone on Earth gets $300 after the spoils of a military victory are distributed. The members of the Planet Express staff spend it on different things, with varying degrees of success.

Episodes.Title: Spanish Fry
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Ron Weiner
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: After being abducted by "human horn" poachers, Fry goes on a search for his missing nose.

Episodes.Title: Bend Her
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Michael Rowe
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Bender enters the Olympics as a Fembot and has modifications to maintain the illusion, leading to a romantic encumbrance with a soap opera star.

Episodes.Title: Obsoletely Fabulous
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Dan Vebber
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: The introduction of a new type of robot makes Bender rethink his devotion to technology.

Episodes.Title: Bender Should Not Be Allowed on TV
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Lew Morton
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Bender becomes a star on his favorite soap opera by forgetting his lines and reverting to character, but becomes concerned about the effect he is having on the audience.

Episodes.Title: The Devil's Hands Are Idle Playthings
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Ken Keeler
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry makes a deal with the Robot Devil so he can get robot hands to play the holophoner and impress Leela. In a twist of fate, Fry trades hands with the Robot Devil and writes a masterpiece opera about Leela. However, the Robot Dev...
